Sentence: Beaver, Peter, Susan, and Lucy plot to meet Aslan at the Stone Table the following day, but they soon notice that Edmund has disappeared
Aslan sends Peter to help her (Susan)
The following night, Susan and Lucy observe Aslan grow increasingly gloomy and sad
Susan and Lucy leave the pavilion to search for Aslan
Together, Aslan, Susan, and Lucy walk to the Stone Table, where Aslan tells them to leave
Susan and Lucy hide behind some bushes and watch the Witch and a horde of her (Witch) followers torment, humiliate, and finally kill Aslan
Susan and Lucy stay with Aslan's dead body all night
Suddenly Susan and Lucy hear Aslan's voice from behind him (Aslan)
Aslan, Susan, and Lucy charge join the battle between Peter's army and the Witch's troops
